title: Moving on From a Difficult Past
itunes:author: Guest: Elizabeth Oates
itunes:summary:
Even if you've come from a difficult family situation, God can still redeem your story. The key is never trying to heal on your own. John and Danny explain why counseling can help in overcoming a painful family past. Featuring Elizabeth Oates.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Elizabeth Oates' book "Mending Broken Branches" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-27?refcd=1132601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/moving-on-from-a-difficult-past/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
